description:
The desert house was a lot of fun. It was big, secluded, and private. The guys really had fun and it was nice watching them let it "all hang out."
About a month after we left, I got an e-mail from the hot daddy who owns the place. He wanted us back and he wanted us to do an orgy. So, who am I to argue? We hadn't done one in a while...
So we went back to the desert house with a group of five guys for Fuckfest 6: Billy, Nicolas, Gage, Ford, and Danny.
The guys were in great spirits, the chemistry was great, and the sexual tension was palpable. These guys fucked and sucked their way from inside to out!
title: Fuckfest 6
